    A

    addWord(String) - Method in class editor.SpellCheckEditor
    Adds a word to the dictionary.
    addWord(String, String) - Method in class editor.TranslateEditor

    C

    Creates a clone of the SpellCheckEditor.

    Creates a new instance of Editor.

    createEditor() - Method in class editor.TranslateEditorCreator

    D

    dictionary - Variable in class editor.SpellCheckEditor

    E

    editor - package editor
     
    editor - Variable in class editor.LoadThread
    The editor whose state will be loaded.
    editor - Variable in class editor.SaveThread
    The editor whose state will be saved.
    Editor - Class in editor
    Represents a simple text editor that can hold and manipulate text.
    Editor() - Constructor for class editor.Editor
    Constructs an Editor with an empty text.
    Editor(String) - Constructor for class editor.Editor
    Constructs an Editor with the specified text.
    EditorCreator - Interface in editor
    Interface for creating instances of Editor.
    EditorGUI - Class in Unnamed Package
    EditorGUI is a graphical user interface for a text editor that allows users to create, load, and manipulate text.
    EditorGUI() - Constructor for class EditorGUI
    Constructs the EditorGUI and initializes the user interface.
    englishWords - Variable in class editor.TranslateEditor
    Lists to store English and Lithuanian words.

    F

    findAndReplace(String, String) - Method in class editor.Editor
    Returns the current text in the editor.

    G

    getDictionary() - Method in class editor.SpellCheckEditor
    Returns the content of the dictionary as a string, with each word on a new line.
    getEnglishWords() - Method in class editor.TranslateEditor
    Returns the English words in the editor as a formatted string.
    getLithuanianWords() - Method in class editor.TranslateEditor
    Returns the Lithuanian words in the editor as a formatted string.

    L

    lithuanianWords - Variable in class editor.TranslateEditor
    Lists to store Lithuanian words corresponding to the English words.
    LoadThread - Class in editor
    LoadThread is a thread that loads the state of an Editor object from a file.
    LoadThread() - Constructor for class editor.LoadThread
    Constructs a LoadThread with an empty editor.

    M

    main(String[]) - Static method in class EditorGUI
    The main method to run the EditorGUI application.

    P

    put(String) - Method in class editor.Editor
    Returns the current text in the editor.

    R

    replace(String) - Method in class editor.SpellCheckEditor
    Replaces a word with the closest match from the dictionary if it is not found in the dictionary.
    reset() - Method in class editor.Editor
    Returns the current text in the editor.
    reset() - Method in class editor.SpellCheckEditor
    Resets the editor's text and clears the dictionary.
    reset() - Method in class editor.TranslateEditor
    Resets the state of the TranslateEditor by clearing the lists of English and Lithuanian words.
    run() - Method in class editor.LoadThread
    Constructs a LoadThread with the specified editor.
    run() - Method in class editor.SaveThread
    Constructs a SaveThread with the specified editor.

    S

    SaveThread - Class in editor
    SaveThread is a thread that saves the state of an Editor object to a file.
    SaveThread(Editor) - Constructor for class editor.SaveThread
    Constructs a SaveThread with an empty editor.
    spellcheck() - Method in class editor.SpellCheckEditor
    Performs spell-checking on the text by replacing each word with its closest match from the dictionary.
    SpellCheckEditor - Class in editor
    SpellCheckEditor is an extension of the Editor class that provides spell-checking functionality.
    SpellCheckEditor() - Constructor for class editor.SpellCheckEditor
    Constructs a SpellCheckEditor with an empty text and initializes an empty dictionary.
    SpellCheckEditor(String) - Constructor for class editor.SpellCheckEditor
    Constructs a SpellCheckEditor with the specified text and initializes an empty dictionary.
    SpellCheckEditorCreator - Class in editor
    TranslateEditorCreator is a class that implements the EditorCreator interface.
    SpellCheckEditorCreator() - Constructor for class editor.SpellCheckEditorCreator
     

    T

    text - Variable in class editor.Editor
    The text content of the editor.
    toString() - Method in class editor.Editor
    Returns the current text in the editor.
    toString() - Method in class editor.SpellCheckEditor
    Returns a string representation of the SpellCheckEditor, including its text.
    toString() - Method in class editor.TranslateEditor
    Translates the text in the editor from Lithuanian to English.
    translate(boolean) - Method in class editor.TranslateEditor
    Translates the text in the editor from English to Lithuanian or vice versa.
    TranslateEditor - Class in editor
    TranslateEditor is a specialized editor that allows for translation between English and Lithuanian words.
    TranslateEditor() - Constructor for class editor.TranslateEditor
    Constructs a TranslateEditor with an empty text and initializes empty lists for English and Lithuanian words.
    TranslateEditor(String) - Constructor for class editor.TranslateEditor
    Constructs a TranslateEditor with the specified text and initializes empty lists for English and Lithuanian words.
    TranslateEditorCreator - Class in editor
    TranslateEditorCreator is a class that implements the EditorCreator interface.
    TranslateEditorCreator() - Constructor for class editor.TranslateEditorCreator
     
    translation(boolean) - Method in class editor.TranslateEditor
    Translates the text in the editor from English to Lithuanian.

    U

    updateState(Editor) - Method in class editor.Editor
    Returns the current text in the editor.
    updateState(Editor) - Method in class editor.SpellCheckEditor
    Updates the state of the SpellCheckEditor with the state of another Editor.
    updateState(Editor) - Method in class editor.TranslateEditor
    Updates the state of the TranslateEditor with the state of another Editor.
